{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b7690aee050018562bb2"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b7690aee050018562bb3"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:36:09.788+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b7690aee050018562bb4"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:36:09.901+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"2975581e-f598-44fe-984d-a1ee6e08b54e","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:36:09.752+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"Book your practical driving test for:

- cars
- motorcycles
- lorries, buses and coaches
- approved driving instructor (ADI) part 2 and 3 tests

^ This page is also available [in Welsh (Cymraeg)](/archebu-prawf-gyrru-ymarferol).  

## Book a test online

You'll be put in a queue when you start booking your driving test - you'll be told how long you'll need to wait once you begin. This is faster than booking by phone because the phone lines are very busy at the moment.

You can book a test up to 24 weeks in the future. There is no waiting list or cancellation list.

This service is available from 6am to 11:40pm.

*[ADI]: approved driving instructor  
","link":"https://driverpracticaltest.dvsa.gov.uk/application","major_change":false,"more_information":"
You need your:

- UK driving licence number  
- credit or debit card
- driving instructor’s personal reference number if you want to check they're available

You can [check the cost](/driving-test-cost) of your driving test before you start. 

You must have lived in England, Wales or Scotland for at least 185 days in the last 12 months before the day you take your test.

^There's a different service to book your driving test in [Northern Ireland](https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/services/book-your-practical-driving-test-online). 

You can [check for earlier appointments](/change-driving-test) after you’ve booked. These are sometimes called ‘cancellation appointments’.

## Book a test to upgrade your licence

You must call the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) if you need an 'upgrade' test, such as automatic to manual car, or medium-sized lorry to a large lorry. 

$C
DVSA driving test booking support  
Telephone: 0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm  
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C  


##When you do not need a theory test
You must usually have passed your [theory test](/book-theory-test) before booking.

You do not need a theory test to book a:

- tractor test    
- test to upgrade from automatic to manual     
- test to progress through the motorcycle categories (progressive access)        
- lorry and trailer test, when you've got a lorry licence
- bus and trailer test, when you've got a bus licence
- lorry test, when you’ve got a medium lorry licence
- bus test, when you’ve got a minibus licence 


##Help with your booking

### Help accessing the online service

Find out [what to do if you’re having problems accessing the online service](/guidance/book-and-manage-your-driving-test-problems-accessing-the-service), for example:  

+ you get an ‘error 15’ message after selecting ‘Start now’
+ the service does not load after selecting ‘Start now’
+ you get a ‘search limit reached’ message

### Get help booking your test
Contact DVSA to get help booking your test.

$C
DVSA driving test booking support       
<customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>  
Telephone: 0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm  
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C


*[ADI]: approved driving instructor
*[CPC]: Certificate of Professional Competence
*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency ","need_to_know":"","overview":"Book your official DVSA practical driving test for cars from £62, or other types of practical driving tests, including motorcycle and driving instructor tests

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b5ad0aee050014562ba8"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b5ad0aee050014562ba9"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:28:45.575+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b5ad0aee050014562baa"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:28:45.687+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"35956c4e-c9d2-4a52-a68f-7bbf5380e74f","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:28:45.545+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"Use this service to:

- find an earlier driving test (sometimes called a ‘cancellation appointment’)
- move your driving test to a later date
- change which test centre you take your test at

You can change your test up to the time your test starts. You must give notice to change or cancel a test, or you’ll have to pay again.

##When you’ll have to pay again

You’ll have to pay again if you give less than:

- 10 full working days’ notice for car driving tests
- 3 full working days’ notice for all other tests

Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

If you cannot change your driving test appointment, [cancel your test](/cancel-driving-test).

##What you need

To change your test you need your:

- UK driving licence number
- driving test reference number or theory test pass certificate number (from the letter you got when you passed your theory test)

If you’ve lost your letter, you can [find your theory test pass certificate number](/find-lost-theory-test-pass-certificate-number).

## Change your appointment online

This service is available from 6am to 11:40pm. You can find and book appointments up to 24 weeks in advance.

^ Find out [what to do if you’re having problems accessing the online service](/guidance/book-and-manage-your-driving-test-problems-accessing-the-service).^","link":"https://driverpracticaltest.dvsa.gov.uk/login","major_change":false,"more_information":"To change your test for free, you must give at least:

- 10 full working days' notice for car driving tests
- 3 full working days’ notice for all other tests 

Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

## If you change your test at short notice

If you change your test at short notice, you can get a refund after you've changed your test if you have:

- an illness or injury that means you cannot take your test  
- suffered a bereavement  
- to take an exam at a school or college  
- had your driving licence stolen

Email the Driver and Vehicles Standard Agency (DVSA) with the subject title ‘Unavoidable short notice cancellation’. 

Attach proof of the reason you've had to change your appointment. This can be:

- a letter from your school or college confirming you have an exam at the same time as your appointment  
- a crime number and contact name of the police officer if you've had your driving licence stolen
- a fit note or medical certificate from a healthcare professional such as your GP

If you were sick for 7 days or fewer, you might have to pay for a private medical certificate.

As well as attaching the proof, you’ll need to include at least 2 of these in your email:

- driving licence number
- theory test pass certificate number
- driving test booking reference

$C
DVSA customer services  
[customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk](mailto:customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk?subject=Unavoidable short notice cancellation)
$C

DVSA will tell you when you’ve been refunded the fee and can help you find a new test appointment.

##How many times you can change your appointment

You can change your appointment up to 6 times. If you need to make more changes after that, you have to cancel your test and rebook it.

s1. [Cancel your test](/cancel-driving-test). You’ll get a full refund if you give at least 10 full working days’ notice for car driving tests. For all other tests, you'll need to give at least 3 full working days' notice. Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.
s2. [Book a new test](/book-driving-test). You’ll have to pay for the test when you book.

^There’s a different service to [change your driving test in Northern Ireland](https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/services/change-your-practical-driving-test-appointment-online).^

##Get help changing your driving test appointment

You must change your driving test appointment online. You can contact DVSA to get help by phone or email.

You’ll need to give DVSA at least 2 of the following:

- driving licence number
- theory test pass certificate number
- driving test booking reference

$C
DVSA driving test booking support     
<customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>  
Telephone: 0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm  
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C  

*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency","need_to_know":"","overview":"Find an earlier practical driving test, move it to a later date, or change the test centre you take it at.
","owning_org_content_ids":[],"panopticon_id":"4fa11ce79d5eb5495b0002c2","publish_at":null,"publisher":null,"rejected_count":0,"review_requested_at":null,"reviewer":null,"sibling_in_progress":null,"slug":"change-driving-test","start_button_text":"Start now","state":"draft","title":"Change your driving test appointment","updated_at":"2025-04-22T16:28:50.705+01:00","version_number":56,"will_continue_on":"the driving test booking service"}

*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency","link":"https://www.book-theory-test.service.gov.uk?target=gb&lang=gb","major_change":false,"more_information":"You must have lived in England, Wales or Scotland for at least 185 days in the last 12 months before the day you take your theory or driving test.

Car and motorcycle tests cost £23. 

Lorry and bus tests cost: 

- part 1a (multiple-choice questions) - £26 
- part 1b (hazard perception) - £11 
- part 2 (case studies) - £23 

When you book your test, say if you have a [reading difficulty, health condition or disability](/theory-test/reading-difficulty-disability-or-health-condition). 

## When you do not need a theory test

You do not need to take a theory test before you book a driving test to upgrade: 

- an [automatic car licence to a manual](/automatic-driving-licence-to-manual) car licence 
- from category A1 (small motorcycle) to category A2 (medium motorcycle) if you’ve had the licence for at least 2 years
- from category C1 ([medium vehicles](/driving-licence-categories#medium-sized-vehicles)) to category C ([large vehicles](/driving-licence-categories#large-vehicles)) unless you got your C1 entitlement from passing a car driving test
- from category D1 (minibus) to category D (bus)
- any licence to be able to [tow a trailer](/car-trailer-driving-test)

You do not need to take a theory test before you book a:

- [taxi driving test](/dvsa-taxi-driving-test)
- [tractor driving test](/learning-to-drive-a-tractor-or-specialist-vehicle/driving-tests-for-tractors-and-specialist-vehicles)

## Help with your booking

Contact the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) to get help booking your theory test. 

$C
DVSA theory test enquiries\\
<theorycustomerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>\\
Telephone: 0300 200 1122\\
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm\\
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

^ There’s a different service to [book your theory test in Northern Ireland](https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/services/book-change-or-cancel-your-theory-test). ^

*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b9140aee050018562bb5"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b9140aee050018562bb6"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:16.943+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b9150aee050018562bb7"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:17.057+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"e9058682-298d-42c1-969d-1a1b994ad899","change_note":null,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:16.921+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"If you're an instructor or trainer, use this service to:

- book theory tests
- confirm your pupil's details before the test
- check appointments
- change or cancel appointments

^ There’s a different service to [book your own theory test](/book-theory-test). ^

##Register to book theory tests
You must be [registered to book tests](/register-book-driving-tests-for-pupils). You’ll get your Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) business ID, username and password when you register to book.

##Book and manage theory tests online

You'll need your:

- username
- password
- credit or debit card
- pupil's driving licence number if you're confirming their details
","link":"https://www.trainer.book-theory-test.service.gov.uk/","major_change":false,"more_information":"
You can book the following types of test: 

- car
- motorcycle
- lorry and bus, including the Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) part 1 (theory), part 2 (case studies) and conversion tests

## Book without a pupil’s details

You can book tests up to 6 months in advance. You do not have to give a pupil’s details when you book. This is known as being a ‘trainer booker’.  

You must confirm the pupil’s details at least one full working day before the test. Working days do not include Sundays and public holidays.

###Example
$E
Confirm the pupil’s details by Wednesday if the test is on Friday.
$E

## Change or cancel a test

You can change or cancel a test up to 3 full working days before the test. Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

###If you cancel a test at short notice

You can cancel a test within 3 full working days but you’ll have to pay again. Find out when you can get a refund if you [cancel a theory test](/cancel-theory-test) at short notice.

## Help with your bookings

Contact DVSA to get help booking theory tests for your pupils.

$C
DVSA theory test booking support\\
<theorycustomerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>\\
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (then press the 2-digit [fast track code](/guidance/use-the-dvsa-fast-track-service-for-driver-and-rider-trainers))\\
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm\\
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency

","need_to_know":"","overview":"Book theory tests for your pupils, check or change appointment details, or cancel tests.","owning_org_content_ids":[],"panopticon_id":"56faa062ed915d632300013a","publish_at":null,"publisher":null,"rejected_count":0,"review_requested_at":null,"reviewer":null,"sibling_in_progress":null,"slug":"book-pupil-theory-test","start_button_text":"Start now","state":"draft","title":"Book and manage theory tests for your pupils","updated_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:16.925+01:00","version_number":24,"will_continue_on":""}

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b35e9e3a71001823c84a"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b35e9e3a71001823c84b"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:18:54.320+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b35e9e3a71001823c84c"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:18:54.424+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"680a676c71e86b00174758a1"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":"","comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-24T17:31:40.304+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"request_review","requester_id":{"$oid":"62135716d3bf7f2b2bf22419"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"38f2bf2e-b418-431a-a889-127263683725","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:18:54.297+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"Use this service to:

- change which test centre you take your test at

You must give at least 3 full working days’ notice to change your test or you’ll have to pay again. Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

##If you change your test at short notice

If you change your test within 3 full working days of the test date, you’ll have to pay again.

###Get a refund after you’ve changed your test

You can get a refund if you have:

- an illness or injury that means you cannot take your test  
- suffered a bereavement  
- to take an exam at a school or college  
- had your driving licence stolen

Email the Driver and Vehicles Standard Agency (DVSA) with the subject title ‘Unavoidable short notice cancellation’. 

Attach proof of the reason you've had to change your appointment. This can be:

- a letter from your school or college confirming you have an exam at the same time as your appointment  
- a crime number and contact name of the police officer if you've had your driving licence stolen
- a fit note or medical certificate from a healthcare professional such as your GP

If you were sick for 7 days or fewer, you might have to pay for a private medical certificate.

As well as attaching the proof, you’ll need to include your full name (as it appears on your driving licence), address, postcode and date of birth in your email.

You must also include either:

- your driving licence number
- your booking reference number

$C
DVSA customer services  
[customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk](mailto:customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk?subject=Unavoidable short notice cancellation)
$C

DVSA will tell you when you’ve been refunded the fee.

## Change your appointment online

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b2f40aee050018562bad"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b2f40aee050018562bae"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:17:08.820+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b2f40aee050018562baf"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:17:08.913+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"680a66effda30100144ca8b8"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":"","comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-24T17:29:35.074+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"request_review","requester_id":{"$oid":"62135716d3bf7f2b2bf22419"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"4acdab5e-dd3f-4077-b934-8ee4090e62ae","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:17:08.782+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"Cancel your driving theory test if you no longer need your appointment. 

You must give at least 3 full working days’ notice to change your test or you’ll have to pay again. Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

##If you cancel your test at short notice

If you cancel within 3 full working days of the test date, you’ll lose the original fee.

### Get a refund after you’ve cancelled your test

You can get a refund if you have:

- an illness or injury that means you cannot take your test
- suffered a bereavement
- to take an exam at a school or college
- had your driving licence stolen

Email the Driver and Vehicles Standard Agency (DVSA) with the subject title ‘Unavoidable short notice cancellation’. 

Attach proof of the reason you've had to change your appointment. This can be:

- a letter from your school or college confirming you have an exam at the same time as your appointment  
- a crime number and contact name of the police officer if you've had your driving licence stolen
- a fit note or medical certificate from a healthcare professional such as your GP

If you were sick for 7 days or fewer, you might have to pay for a private medical certificate.

As well as attaching the proof, you’ll need to include your full name (as it appears on your driving licence), address, postcode and date of birth in your email.

You must also include either:

- your driving licence number
- your booking reference number


$C
DVSA customer services  
[customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk](mailto:customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk?subject=Unavoidable short notice cancellation)
$C

DVSA will tell you when you’ve been refunded the fee.

##Cancel your test online

You’ll need your UK driving licence number.

","link":"https://driverpracticaltest.dvsa.gov.uk/login","major_change":false,"more_information":"You need your:

- UK driving licence number
- theory test pass certificate number (from the letter you got when you passed your theory test) or your driving test reference number if you have it

##Help with your booking

### Help accessing the online service

Find out [what to do if you’re having problems accessing the online service](/guidance/book-and-manage-your-driving-test-problems-accessing-the-service), for example:  

+ you get an ‘error 15’ message after selecting ‘Start now’
+ the service does not load after selecting ‘Start now’
+ you get a ‘search limit reached’ message

### Get help checking your appointment details
Contact the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) to get help checking your appointment details.

$C
DVSA driving test booking support\\
<customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>  
Telephone: 0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm  
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b7390aee050014562bab"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b7390aee050014562bac"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:35:21.896+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b73a0aee050014562bad"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:35:22.012+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"f27007b2-9cc8-4a87-91c6-f0f2617c699b","body":"You might need to contact the Driver and Vehicle Standards (DVSA) if you’ve lost your theory test pass certificate number.

What you need to do depends on whether you want the number to:

+ book your test
+ take to your test

##If you're booking your test

You usually do not need your theory test pass certificate number to book your driving test. Only contact DVSA if you’re asked for it and cannot find it.

You will need to give your:

- full name as it appears on your driving licence
- UK driving licence number
- date of birth

$C
DVSA theory test enquiries\\
<theorycustomerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>\\
Telephone: 0300 200 1122\\
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm\\
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

##If you're taking your test

You may need another way to prove that you've passed your theory test if you've lost your certificate. What you need to do depends on the type of test.

### If you’re taking a car driving test

You do not need to get a replacement theory test certificate to take to your car driving test.

Your driving examiner will check that you’ve passed your theory test before your driving test starts.

### If you’re taking any other type of driving test

Contact DVSA with your:

- full name as it appears on your driving licence
- address
- driving licence number
- date of birth

You’ll be sent a letter that you can take to your test instead of your pass certificate.

$C
DVSA theory test enquiries  
<theorycustomerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>  
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (press 01)  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm  
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)  
$C

*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency

","change_note":null,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:35:21.881+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"major_change":false,"overview":"Find your lost theory test pass certificate number if you need it to book your driving test","owning_org_content_ids":[],"panopticon_id":"56fee731ed915d6323000264","publish_at":null,"publisher":null,"rejected_count":0,"review_requested_at":null,"reviewer":null,"sibling_in_progress":null,"slug":"find-theory-test-pass-number","state":"draft","title":"Find your lost theory test pass certificate number","updated_at":"2025-04-22T16:35:21.884+01:00","version_number":11}

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b3c69e3a71001823c84d"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b3c69e3a71001823c84e"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:20:38.135+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b3c69e3a71001823c84f"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:20:38.250+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"680a67de71e86b00174758a2"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":"","comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-24T17:33:34.700+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"request_review","requester_id":{"$oid":"62135716d3bf7f2b2bf22419"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"decbce9f-3b5f-4d9f-91b4-c6e016a63ab9","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:20:38.095+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"Book, change or cancel your:

- approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 theory test
- Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) enhanced rider scheme trainer theory test

It costs:

- £81 for an ADI part 1 test
- £66 for a DVSA enhanced rider scheme trainer theory test

^There's a different process to [book your ADI theory test in Northern Ireland](https://www.book-theory-test.service.gov.uk/instructor?target=ni&lang=ni).^

##Book online

You need your:

- UK driving licence number
- personal reference number from DVSA
- email address - you have to book by phone if you do not have one
- credit or debit card

'customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk.","comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-24T17:24:39.284+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"request_review","requester_id":{"$oid":"5228545740f0b6347c000002"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"680a668871e86b00144758a0"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-24T17:27:52.541+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"5228545740f0b6347c000002"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"5228545740f0b6347c000002"}}],"alternate_methods":"
","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"5228545740f0b6347c000002"},"assignee":"Gavan Curley","auth_bypass_id":"54a5725f-e87f-49b6-99dd-e872a6fc1a92","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:47:44.710+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"Check, change or cancel your:

- approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 test
- Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) enhanced rider scheme trainer theory test

You must give at least 3 full working days’ notice to change your test or you’ll have to pay again. Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

^ There's a different process to [check, change or cancel your instructor theory test](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/index/information-and-services/motoring/learners-and-new-drivers/theory-test/how-to-book-change-or-cancel-your-theory-test-appointment.htm) in Northern Ireland. ^

##If you change or cancel your test at short notice  
   
If you change your test within 3 full working days of the test date, you’ll have to pay again.  
   
If you cancel within 3 full working days of the test date, you’ll lose the original fee.  
   
### Get a refund after you’ve changed or cancelled your test  
   
You can get a refund if you have:  
   
- an illness or injury that means you cannot take your test  
- suffered a bereavement  
- to take an exam at a school or college  
- had your driving licence stolen  
   
Email DVSA with the subject title ‘Unavoidable short notice cancellation’.  
   
Attach proof of the reason you've had to change or cancel. This can be:  
   
- a [fit note or medical certificate from a healthcare professional](https://www.nhs.uk/common-health-questions/caring-carers-and-long-term-conditions/when-do-i-need-a-fit-note/)  
- a letter from your school or college confirming you have an exam at the same time as your appointment  
- a crime number and contact name of the police officer if you've had your driving licence stolen  
   
As well as attaching the proof, you’ll need to include your full name (as it appears on your driving licence), address, postcode and date of birth in your email.  
   
You must also include either:  
   
- your driving licence number  
- your test reference number  
   
$C  
DVSA customer services  
[customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk](mailto:customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk?subject=Unavoidable short notice cancellation)  
$C  
   
DVSA will tell you when you’ve been refunded the fee.

##Check, change or cancel a test online

You will need your driving licence number.

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807bff09e3a71001423c84a"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807bff09e3a71001423c84b"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T17:12:32.066+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807bff09e3a71001423c84c"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T17:12:32.184+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"c5e26f37-7b9e-485c-8727-edea43aac589","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T17:12:32.049+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"To apply for a trainee licence to give driving lessons you'll need to:

- have passed the approved driving instructor (ADI) part 2 test 
- have done at least 40 hours of training with a qualified ADI

^The online service is available from 6am to 11:30pm.^

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency 
*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency","link":"https://driver-services.dvsa.gov.uk/irdtm","major_change":false,"more_information":"You'll need:

- your online user ID from the Driving and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA)
- your password

It costs £140 and you'll need a debit or credit card to pay. It will take about 30 minutes to apply.

^There's a different process to [apply for a trainee licence](https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/services/apply-become-adi-or-ami-online) in Northern Ireland.^

##Finishing your application

To finish your application you'll need to email the following documents to DVSA:

* your [‘application for trainee licence: declaration of manager/owner’ form](/government/publications/trainee-driving-instructor-declaration-of-manager-or-owner)
* the [‘instructor training declaration’ form](/government/publications/trainee-driving-instructor-training-declaration) to prove you've done 40 hours of training if it’s your first trainee licence

Send them by email to <padi@dvsa.gov.uk>.  

##Your user ID and password

Your user ID can be found on all letters sent to you by DVSA. It's not the same as your ADI personal reference number.

[Request your user ID from DVSA](https://submit.forms.service.gov.uk/form/2634/request-your-driving-instructor-services-user-id) if you do not know what it is. You’ll need your driving licence number.

###Rules for passwords
You cannot use any of your 5 previously used passwords.

Your password must be at least 9 characters long. It must include at least 3 of these 4 types of characters: 

- uppercase characters, for example A B C
- lowercase characters, for example a b c
- numeric digits, for example 1 2 3
- special characters, for example £ % &

##Help with your application

Email DVSA if you have any problems applying online.

$C
DVSA\\
<customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>
$C


*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency
*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor","need_to_know":"","overview":"Apply for a trainee driving instructor licence to help you prepare for the approved driving instructor (ADI) part 3 test","owning_org_content_ids":[],"panopticon_id":"4fd1de25a4254a36b600001a","publish_at":null,"publisher":null,"rejected_count":0,"review_requested_at":null,"reviewer":null,"sibling_in_progress":null,"slug":"apply-for-a-trainee-driving-instructor-licence","start_button_text":"Start now","state":"draft","title":"Apply for a trainee driving instructor licence","updated_at":"2025-04-22T17:12:36.552+01:00","version_number":19,"will_continue_on":"the Department for Transport website"}

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b9140aee050018562bb5"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b9140aee050018562bb6"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:16.943+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807b9150aee050018562bb7"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:17.057+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"alternate_methods":"","archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"e9058682-298d-42c1-969d-1a1b994ad899","change_note":null,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:43:16.921+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"introduction":"If you're an instructor or trainer, use this service to:

- book theory tests
- confirm your pupil's details before the test
- check appointments
- change or cancel appointments

^ There’s a different service to [book your own theory test](/book-theory-test). ^

##Register to book theory tests
You must be [registered to book tests](/register-book-driving-tests-for-pupils). You’ll get your Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) business ID, username and password when you register to book.

##Book and manage theory tests online

You'll need your:

- username
- password
- credit or debit card
- pupil's driving licence number if you're confirming their details
","link":"https://www.trainer.book-theory-test.service.gov.uk/","major_change":false,"more_information":"
You can book the following types of test: 

- car
- motorcycle
- lorry and bus, including the Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) part 1 (theory), part 2 (case studies) and conversion tests

## Book without a pupil’s details

You can book tests up to 6 months in advance. You do not have to give a pupil’s details when you book. This is known as being a ‘trainer booker’.  

You must confirm the pupil’s details at least one full working day before the test. Working days do not include Sundays and public holidays.

###Example
$E
Confirm the pupil’s details by Wednesday if the test is on Friday.
$E

## Change or cancel a test

You can change or cancel a test up to 3 full working days before the test. Monday to Saturday count as working days but Sundays and public holidays do not.

###If you cancel a test at short notice

You can cancel a test within 3 full working days but you’ll have to pay again. Find out when you can get a refund if you [cancel a theory test](/cancel-theory-test) at short notice.

## Help with your bookings

Contact DVSA to get help booking theory tests for your pupils.

$C
DVSA theory test booking support\\
<theorycustomerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>\\
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 (then press the 2-digit [fast track code](/guidance/use-the-dvsa-fast-track-service-for-driver-and-rider-trainers))\\
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm\\
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency

{"_id":{"$oid":"6807ba7e9e3a71001823c85f"},"actions":[{"_id":{"$oid":"6807ba7e9e3a71001823c860"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:49:18.121+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":null,"request_details":{},"request_type":"new_version","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}},{"_id":{"$oid":"6807ba7e9e3a71001823c861"},"approved":null,"approver_id":null,"comment":null,"comment_sanitized":false,"created_at":"2025-04-22T16:49:18.220+01:00","customised_message":null,"email_addresses":null,"recipient_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"request_details":{},"request_type":"assign","requester_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"}}],"archiver":null,"assigned_to_id":{"$oid":"573b28c6e5274a166c0e3745"},"assignee":"Polly Green","auth_bypass_id":"af4fd865-7f81-450b-9faf-3ab97528f614","body":"You can apply for approval to book and manage driving and motorcycle tests for your pupils if you're:

- an approved driving instructor (ADI)
- a business that provides driving lessons and employs ADIs
- a motorcycle approved training body (ATB)
- a vocational driving instructor who trains lorry, bus or coach drivers

If your application is approved, you can:

- book more than one test at the same time
- swap test appointments for your pupils
- book some types of test without giving your pupil's details at the time

You can only book tests for learner drivers or riders who are being taught by you or your business.

^You may lose your fee if you [cancel a test](/cancel-driving-test) at short notice or do not use it.

##How to apply for approval

How you apply to the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) depends on what kind of test you need to book.

###Car driving tests

If you’re a driving instructor, you’ll need your ADI personal reference number to apply to book car driving tests.

[Apply to book car driving tests if you’re a driving instructor](https://submit.forms.service.gov.uk/form/5150/apply-to-book-car-driving-tests-if-you-are-a-driving-instructor). 

If you’re a business, you’ll need an instructor’s ADI personal reference number to apply to book car driving tests.

[Apply to book car driving tests if you're a business who employs driving instructors](https://submit.forms.service.gov.uk/form/5151/apply-to-book-car-driving-tests-if-you-are-a-business-who-employs-driving-instructors). 

###Motorcycle tests

[Apply to book motorcycle tests](https://submit.forms.service.gov.uk/form/5043/apply-to-book-motorcycle-tests-for-your-pupils). 

###Vocational tests

[Apply to book vocational tests](https://submit.forms.service.gov.uk/form/5044/apply-to-book-vocational-driving-tests-for-your-pupils). 

###ADI qualifying tests

[Apply to book ADI qualifying tests](https://submit.forms.service.gov.uk/form/5153/apply-to-book-approved-driving-instructor-adi-qualifying-tests). 

##After you apply 

You’ll usually get a decision by email within 10 working days. 

If your application is approved, DVSA will send you an activation code by email. To sign in to the booking service, you’ll need: 

- the activation code
- your DVSA business ID
- the postcode of your business


## Booking theory tests

You must have been approved by DVSA to book driving and motorcycle tests before you can [book theory tests for your pupils](/book-pupil-theory-test).

##If you need help

Contact DVSA customer services to get help applying to book driving and motorcycle tests.

$C
DVSA customer services\\
<customerservices@dvsa.gov.uk>\\
Telephone: 0300 200 1122 \\
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm\\
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

*[ADI]: approved driving instructor
*[ATB]: approved training body 
*[DVSA]: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency","change_note":"","created_at":"2025-04-22T16:49:18.101+01:00","creator":"Polly Green","in_beta":false,"major_change":false,"overview":"Apply to the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) for approval to book and manage driving and motorcycle tests for your pupils.","owning_org_content_ids":[],"panopticon_id":"6297770ed3bf7f150e4ee6bc","publish_at":null,"publisher":null,"rejected_count":0,"review_requested_at":null,"reviewer":null,"sibling_in_progress":null,"slug":"apply-approval-book-pupil-driving-motorcycle-tests","state":"draft","title":"Apply for approval to book driving and motorcycle tests for your pupils","updated_at":"2025-04-22T16:49:21.172+01:00","version_number":4}
